title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Jun 8 2021
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Jun 8 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


Kamala Harris n 2017: "Say it loud, say it clear, everyone is welcome here." Now, Kommie tells Guatemalans not to come to America. Rep. Byron Donalds on how Biden's reversal of Trump border policy has caused the border crisis. Rush on Trump's announcement speech on illegal immigration and the wall. Harris still refuses to visit the border, jokes on Today Show that she hasn't visited Europe yet either. Andy Ngo talks about Antifa on Fox Business, says he can't get private security protection because of the severity of the threats against him. Caller on double standard on treatment of Trump supporters and Antifa.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


NYC psychiatrist tells Yale audience she fantasizes about shooting white people. Charlotte, NC high school with "Social Justice Homeroom," where critical race theory is mandatory, parents not told about racial or LGBT curriculum. Psaki questioned on Manchin's refusal to vote for the Democrats' voting legislation. Former journalist caller on daughter who turned down Yale. Kamala's mask wearing in Guatemala. David Limbaugh: Rush's love for the audience got him through his final year. Frustrated Connecticut caller upset with his Democrat representatives.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


Connecticut governor to sign legislation declaring racism a public health crisis. Trump and Bill O'Reilly announce stadium tour. Rush on the Bill and Hillary Tour. Caller on how Antifa gets away with it: They're liberals. Prayer in school. Obama's student loan takeover. 71% of Democrats say healthy Americans should still stay home as much as possible. Rush on the difference between liberals and conservatives. Texas restaurant hires homeless man. Kamala to illegal immigrants: Do not come.
